remarks: Group multiple (exponentiation) operation at a negative integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulg1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulg1.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnegnn.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
mulgnegnn $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ X e. B ) -> ( -u N .x. X ) = ( I ` ( N .x. X ) ) ) $.
